alert.note: Alert for Inland Sussex; Kent (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 2:08PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Sussex and southeastern Kent Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 208 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Andrewsville to near Ellendale to near Milton. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Milford, Harrington, Ellendale, Bowers, Viola, Big Stone Beach, Andrewsville, Felton, Greenwood, Frederica, Houston, Farmington and Riverview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
